```{r setup}
library(soilmoistr)
library(iffitoR)
```

```{r}
landsld = landsld[grepl("trans|rota|fast", landsld$second_level), ]

##### IN SEQUENCE
start = Sys.time()
seq = get_sm_data(landsld = landsld,
                  path_sm = path_sm)
end = Sys.time()
t1 = end - start
#################


##### In Parallel
start = Sys.time()
par = get_sm_data_parallel(landsld = landsld,
                           path_sm = path_sm)
end = Sys.time()
t2 = end - start
##################

```
